welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saint-Amable, where the charm of our quaint town will surely captivate you. Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and indulge in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Jean Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Jean Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, mainly used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
